room_title: Escape room "Merlin's House" by Smart Escape in Baltimore
room_description: You have wandered into a some strange house in the woods… A house that belongs to Merlin, the oldest known wizard in the world. It was he who helped King Arthur obtain the Sword of Excalibur. He even mastered how to flawlessly transform into any beast and back. Merlin has proved, time and time again that he is not to be messed with. Unfortunately for you, he is not a fan of guests as anyone who enters this house will stay here forever as a piece of furniture of even possibly a rat. Quick! You must get as far away as possible from here, Merlin will be back in exactly one hour. Trust me, you don’t want to be here when he returns…
